#summary Getting started

= Introduction =

The code for Perl App Engine is completely in its formative stages (pre-alpha).

Explanations:
 * PerlAppEngineDesign
 * PerlAppEngineProgress200807

Here are instructions on how to keep abreast of what's going on (as an anonymous non-committer).

= Initial Setup =

{{{
 cd $HOME/src
 svn checkout http://perl-appengine.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/  perl-appengine
 svn checkout http://sys-protect.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/     sys-protect
 svn checkout http://protobuf-perl.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/   protobuf-perl
}}}

= Later Synchronization =

{{{
 cd $HOME/src
 cd perl-appengine; svn update; cd ..
 cd sys-protect;    svn update; cd ..
 cd protobuf-perl;  svn update; cd ..
}}}
